# participantQuitInTurn(with:nextParticipants:turnTimeout:match:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Forfeits the match on behalf of the local player when it’s their turn.

## Declaration

```swift
func participantQuitInTurn(with matchOutcome: GKTurnBasedMatch.Outcome, nextParticipants: [GKTurnBasedParticipant], turnTimeout timeout: TimeInterval, match matchData: Data, completionHandler: (((any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func participantQuitInTurn(with matchOutcome: GKTurnBasedMatch.Outcome, nextParticipants: [GKTurnBasedParticipant], turnTimeout timeout: TimeInterval, match matchData: Data) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **matchOutcome**: The outcome of the local player who forfeits the match. Don’t pass `nil` as this parameter.
- **nextParticipants**: Match participants in the order you want Game Center to pass the turn. Game Center passes the turn to the next participant in the array when communication fails or a participant doesn’t finish their turn within the time limit. Elements in this array must be in the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatch/participants] property.
- **timeout**: The length of time a participant has to complete their turn before Game Center passes the turn to the next participant. The maximum value is 90 days.
- **matchData**: Your game-specific data representing the match state. For example, include information needed for the next participant to take their turn in this object. Don’t pass `nil` as this parameter.
- **completionHandler**: The block that GameKit calls when it completes the request.

The block receives the following parameter:



## Discussion

Invoke this method to forfeit the match when the local player is the current participant. To receive turn-based events that this method generates, register a listener that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedEventListener] protocol with the local player. See [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/starting-turn-based-matches-and-passing-turns-between-players].

## Forfeiting a Match

- **participantQuitOutOfTurn(with:withCompletionHandler:)**: Forfeits the match on behalf of the local player when it’s not their turn.
- **GKTurnBasedMatch.Outcome**: The state of a participant when they forfeit a match or when a match ends.
